task.title: Register an AuthDelegate
task.shortdesc: To enable authentication create an AuthDelegate and pass it to Livefyre.js Authentication.

taskbody.context: An AuthDelegate is an object you define that determines how users will log in, log out, and view profiles.

step.cmd: Create an AuthDelegate. The way you construct an AuthDelegate depends on your identity provider. See Identity Integration for more detailed instructions.
